title: Rename brand name to KBR Silks

requirements.summary: Update the brand name from 'Silk Splendor' to 'KBR Silks' throughout the frontend UI
acceptanceCriteria: The top header displays 'KBR Silks' instead of 'Silk Splendor'
The browser tab title reads 'KBR Silks'
No visible instance of 'Silk Splendor' remains anywhere in the UI

Update the <title> tag from 'Silk Saree Business App' to 'KBR Silks' to ensure the browser tab displays the new brand name.
